goal.en: The goal of this course is to learn the basic principles and practices of electronic devices and circuits.
goal.ch: 學習基本電子元件與電路之基礎原理與實務。

content.en:
週次 內容 備註
1 Introduction of Course and Grouping for Experiments
2 Experiment I : Color Code of Resisters、Kirchhoff Voltage/Current Law
3 Experiment II: Thevenin、Norton and Superposition Principles
4 Experiment III: Transient Response of Capacitor and Capacitor-Resistor Circuits
5 Experiment IV: Response of RC, RL and RCL Circuits
6 Experiment IV: Response of RC, RL and RCL Circuits
7 Experiment V: Characteristics of Diode
8 Break for Mid-Term Exam
9 Experiment VI: Diode Circuits
10 Experiment VII: V-I Characteristics of Electronic Transisters
11 Experiment VII: V-I Characteristics of Electronic Transisters
12 Experiment VIII: BJT Amplifier
13 Experiment VIII: BJT Amplifier
14 Experiment IX: Characteristics and Application of JFET
15 Experiment IX: Characteristics and Application of JFET
16 Experiment X: Multivibrator
17 Experiment X: Multivibrator
18 TA‘s Assignment
content.ch:
週次 內容 備註
1 課程簡介與實驗分組
2 實驗一 色碼電阻、克希荷夫電壓電流定律
3 實驗二 戴維寧、諾頓與重疊定理
4 實驗三 電容、RC電路的暫態電壓
5 實驗四 RC、RL、RCL電路響應
6 實驗四 RC、RL、RCL電路響應
7 實驗五 二極體 Part I
8 期中考停課
9 實驗六 二極體 Part II
10 實驗七 電晶體的認識與V-I特性曲線的測量
11 實驗七 電晶體的認識與V-I特性曲線的測量
12 實驗八 BJT電晶體放大器
13 實驗八 BJT電晶體放大器
14 實驗九 JFET 之認識與應用
15 實驗九 JFET 之認識與應用
16 實驗十 多諧振盪器
17 實驗十 多諧振盪器
18 助教保留
